TopicTitle: you think you are having a bad day?

Articles.Content:
Rules: Simple

-I start by saying something bad happend to me

-Next poster says "you think you are having a bad day?" followed by something worse

-The next poster does the same

-It doesnt have to be KSP related, but its preferred

Example:

P1: I killed Jeb

P2: You think you are having a bad day? I killed Bill, Bob and Jeb

P3: you think you are having a bad day? I ran out of memory and have to delete mods!

Ill start

I killed Jeb.
You think you're having a bad day??? Jeb killed me!

Thats the spirit!

You think you are having a bad day? Danny Killed everyone! Twice!
And you think that's bad? My whole classroom got stuck in mud at recess today.
You think you are having a bad day? I ran out of bacon and had to eat sausage instead!
You think you're having a bad day? I ate all the sausages so I had to eat EGGS!
You think you're having a bad day? My mom's computer's audio decided to poop out for no reason so I don't even want eggs!
you think THAT's bad? Try being thrown out the airlock!
You think that's bad I can't see out of my 300 dollar glasses anymore!
You think thats bad? my pet spider has poor vision and needs 4 pairs of 300 dollar glasses!
You think thats bad? my pet gecko is constantly falling off the wall and breaking its neck and dying!
Ha! Try dealing with hundreds of people a day all clamoring that Pluto should "still be a planet." That takes it right out of you.

You know what a bad day is? A bunch of people not recognizing the other dwarf planets!

Oh, and don't forget about those nasty internet trolls.
Think that's bad? I'm surrounded by people who haven't got the slightest idea of what the Earth looks like, let alone some dwarf planets! 8-]
You think that's bad? No one in my class has the slight understandment of space mechanics!
You think that's bad? Everyone in my class calls any rocket they see a space shuttle.
You think that's bad? 0.26 isn't out yet!

You think that's bad? I don't have enough internet to even get 0.25! (well... only until I get home in a few days xD)

edit: false alarm, I had enough internet for the 300mb download xD

Edited October 8, 2014 by Overfloater

You think thats bad? I dont even have internet!

Wait, what?

You think that's bad?

I'm typing this post on my phone while stuck in mud in my backyard garden!

You think that's bad? Try walking through 50 meters of foot-deep snow in bare feet to take the compost out every day in the winter.

Also try: Atrocious unit-mixing.

Edited October 10, 2014 by GreeningGalaxy

You think that's bad? Here, it's going to snow on Thursday, and it's only the middle of November.
That's bad for you? Here (Kouthern Kalifornia), it barely even rains.

You think that's bad? Here in Italy we have the "bombe d'acqua" where does not stop raining, rivers overflowing and people are dying because the company that built the bridges and bars containment anti-overflow filled the cement columns with polystyrene.
